Petal Restaurant

Petal Restaurant is more than just a dining experience; it's a journey of taste and artistry

Interior

As you savor your meal, don't forget to cast your eyes upward and behold the masterpiece that graces our ceiling—a stunning mural hand-painted by the renowned Italian artist, Giovanni De Cunto. This breathtaking artwork infuses the restaurant with an air of sophistication and culture, creating a unique dining experience that transcends the ordinary.

Our Menu

Begin your day with a revitalizing breakfast at Petal, where we offer an array of wholesome options that are as delicious as they are nutritious.

Our commitment to your well-being shines through in each carefully crafted dish, prepared with the finest ingredients to fuel your day ahead.

Our menu is an exquisite fusion of flavors, showcasing a dedication to freshness and innovation. Indulge in dishes that celebrate the season's finest ingredients, expertly prepared by our talented culinary team.

Join us at Petal, where flavor and art unite in perfect harmony

Our commitment to healthful cuisine and the unparalleled beauty of Giovanni De Cunto's masterpiece combine to create a dining experience that is as enriching as it is indulgent.
